title: CONTEST! Win an Arbitrator MIPS Helmet and Firewall MTB Goggle from Sweet Protection
content:
As cyclists, we are often pushing our own boundaries to expand our skillset & fitness. While you’re pushing limits, you don’t want to be worrying about whether or not your head and face are protected should you take a turn a little too hot. Enter Sweet Protection with their Arbitrator MIPS Helmet and Firewall MTB Goggles to keep you safe on the trail.

The Arbitrator is a brand new, convertible full-face helmet from Sweet Protection. Being a full-on downhill-certified full face, yet with a removable chin bar, this helmet is simple to convert into a trail helmet. It even has two different retention systems – trail mode, and full-face mode for downhill. Large intake and exit ports and STACC ventilation keep your head cool no matter how hot your laps.

The Firewall Goggles are a cylindrical injection molded single lens goggle in a retro-looking design with an ultra-wide field of vision. Extended ventilation and a fit made for both the Fullface- and Trail/Enduro-specific helmets from Sweet Protection. The TPU-frame and triple layer foam adapt the goggle to your face for improved comfort while maintaining plenty of ventilation.

Want to win this helmet and goggles? Just answer this quick 4-question survey below to enter to WIN an Arbitrator MIPS Helmet and Firewall MTB Goggle from Sweet Protection. All multiple-choice questions and email fields require an answer to enter the contest.
author: Zach Burton
